Welcome, Earthlink interns. Ask away. Can you maybe explain a bit  
more about your project? It's nice to think our crawler is helping  
rid the world of malware...

-Paul

On Apr 18, 2007, at 2:20 PM, badswalu wrote:
> Hi all, we're a couple of Earthlink Interns attempting to use heritrix
> as part of a threat detection system. We are new to heritrix so we may
> be back to ask questions. Thanks in advance - badswalu
